name: funny turtle for kids - free game
name_original: funny turtle for kids - free game
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8). This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:

Here is a shot ducks that will entertain your child. The goal is to make as many points. For this it is necessary to reach the most possible duck and avoid touching the red ducks. When a level is successful a turtle image becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:

In this game your child will lead a rocket. To win it is necessary to collect a maximum point going as high as possible. For this, your child must avoid the obstacles and collect cans of fuel. In the two player mode the winner will be one who will climb as high as possible. When a level is successful a turtle image becomes available in the image gallery.

Features:
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of turtles.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 pictures of turtles to be released.

the following languages ​​are available:

Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malaysian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
